conversations.content: Create a new file for my project status report that summarizes this quarter's work.

arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731018800000_o9p0q1r2s", "workspaceId": "ws_1731018800000_t3u4v5w6x", "sessionDescription": "Creating quarterly status report", "sessionMemory": "User wants summary of this quarter's achievements for project stakeholders.", "toolContext": "User requesting new report file creation", "primaryGoal": "Create project status report", "subgoal": "Initialize report file"}, "filePath": "Reports/Q4-2025-Status.md", "content": "# Q4 2025 Project Status Report

- Completed phase 1 implementation
- Resolved critical bugs

## Next Steps
- Begin phase 2 work
- Conduct user testing
"}
